Function Documentation

void EagleLoggerEvent_Delete ( EagleLoggerEvent *  event  ) 

Delete a logger event.

Note:
If you have sent the event to a logger do not use this function, the logger will take care of freeing the event when it no longer needs it.
Parameters:
[in] event The event to release.
